readOnly.description: No allow to change the code, Default `false`

collapsible.description: Define if component is collapsible, Default `false`

collapsed.description: Define if component is collapsed, Default `false`

showDeleteButton.description: Show or hide delete button, Default `true`

showCopyButton.description: Show or hide copy button, Default `true`

code.description: Code to show on component, Default `Js code example`

languageCode.description: language in which the code is written to embellish the syntax, Default `javascript`

codeLink.description: Link to code, ex: CodeSandbox, CodePen. Default `""`

buttonBgColor.description: Background color of the buttons in the header. Default `"dark"`

buttonBorderNone.description: Hide or show buttons border. Default `true`

buttonTextColor.description: Color of the buttons in the header. Default `"warning"`

buttonPaddingTop.description: Paddin top of the buttons in the header. Default `"0"`

buttonPaddingBottom.description: Paddin bottom of the buttons in the header. Default `"0"`

updateCode.description: Function to handle the change made in the code.

children.description: Array of element to show inside Code
